trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"></xref> event, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging"> </xref> evento, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing"> </xref> evento, ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartCancelEventHandler delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> event, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método especificado no delegado WebPartCancelEventHandler é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>evento, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>evento, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>o evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute, `OnWebPartClosing` attribute, or `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Os programadores de página podem fornecer processadores personalizados para eventos de peças Web adicionando um `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` atributo, `OnWebPartClosing` atributo, ou `OnWebPartDeleting` atributo para o `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento na página e atribuir um nome de método personalizado para o atributo.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Também pode ser atribuído um processador personalizado através de programação.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a atribuição de forma programática um processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: como: ligar métodos de processador de eventos para eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
